info.name: visualize_image_labels
info.description: A module for visualizing labeled images

inputs.name: image_labels_path
inputs.description: A JSON file containing the labels for the image specified by image_path

inputs.name: image_set_labels_path
inputs.description: A JSON file containing the labels for each image in the directory specified by images_dir

outputs.name: output_path
outputs.description: The labeled version of the image specified by image_path

outputs.name: output_dir
outputs.description: The labeled versions of the images specified by images_dir

parameters.name: annotation_config
parameters.description: an eta.core.annotations.AnnotationConfig describing how to render the annotations on the images. If omitted, the default settings are used
